original_text: Those that were numbered of them, even of the tribe of Zebulun, were fifty and seven thousand and four hundred.
korean_text: 스불론 지파에서 계수된 자는 오만 칠천사백 명이었더라

sentences.original_text: Those that were numbered of them
even of the tribe of Zebulun
were fifty and seven thousand and four hundred
